long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app has communication protocol for A-Touch Domotics Gateway

The communication packets must be transmitted over TCP/IP to the Ethernet adaptor that delivers data packets to the Gateway controller.

The packets are exclusively composed by ASCII characters constituting fields separated by 
commas and terminated by CR+LF (\r\n).
There are 2 types of commands: 
- encrypted
- non encrypted

History
Revision 0.9
- New icon
Revision 0.8
- New encryption
- Need 0 prefix for non-encrypted message
